# Ferguson Southward

-->
}}
Ferguson Southward (21 October 1898 â€“ December 1981) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1920s. He played at representative level for Cumberland, and at club level for Salford.
Background
Ferguson Southward was born in Cockermouth, Cumberland, England, and he died aged 83 in Cockermouth, Cumbria, England.
Playing career
County honours
Southward represented Cumberland while at Salford.
